onboarding_one_desc: Experience the coninvenience of Furlongo, Where reliable goods vehicle booking are just a click away
onboarding_two_desc: For small packages to large shipments, furlongo caters to all your goods vehicle booking needs effortlessly!
onboarding_three_desc: Say Good bye to delays and uncertainties Furlongo guarantees prompt,secure and timely delivery of goods!
ultimate_destination: Your ultimate destination for all things.
agree_terms_conditions: I agree with all terms and conditions
Global_Positioning: Global Positioning System (GPS): Helps drivers find the right direction.
Notifications: Notifications: Keeps drivers up-to-date on what's happening on their mobile device.
Navigation: Navigation: Provides real-time information about routes and traffic.
Daily_summary: Daily summary report: Provides insights into a driver's working day.
Live_location: Live location sharing: Helps riders anticipate a driver's arrival time and traffic.
Trip_history: Trip history: Tracks a vehicle's trips and helps identify unauthorized trips.
Route_optimization: Route optimization: Helps keep drivers organized and reach the correct destination.
enter_code_description: Please Enter 4-digit OTP sent to your mobile number
